ngiemboon: Zsé ngie, á ge láʼ gwɔ́ na melyɛʼɛ́ láʼ nzsònzèm, ejʉʼ tʉ tɛʼ.
en: But know this: Hard times will come in the last days.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a mesoŋ gwɔ́ mekìm, ńkwoŋ pɔ́ nkáb, ńzẅíŋe móm tɛʼ, é gwɔ́ ngàŋa ŋáʼtè, é ne ńzoonte Ssé zoonte, é tʉʉ twó mbwó metá pɔ́b, é gwɔ́ pajÿò ńjÿɔg ncwò, pɔ́ le gíŋe ńdɔgɔ mmó gie áa ye Ssé ńdɔg ńtóŋo tsɔ́ mmó wɔ́.
en: For people will be lovers of self,   lovers of money,  # 3:2 Lk 16:14; 1Tm 3:3; 6:10 boastful, proud,  # 3:2 Pr 16:18; Lk 1:51; Rm 1:30 demeaning, disobedient to parents, ungrateful, unholy,  # 3:2 1Tm 1:9

ngiemboon: Letʉ́m sɔ́b tʉ páʼ tóon la, pɔ́ gwɔ́ patetsɔ̌ɔn mezìŋe, éshwóŋe té poŋ na pʉ̀a, ayɔ́b nò gwɔ́ pɔ́ lémaʼa tág. Pɔ́ gwɔ́ pɔ́ mefÿɛ́, é gwɔ́ ngàŋmbù nò mbòŋo,
en: unloving, irreconcilable, slanderers,   without self-control, brutal, without love for what is good,  # 3:3 Ti 1:8

ngiemboon: é gwɔ́ pajÿó menáŋ, é gÿo nò pɔ́ ḿvege vege, é gwɔ́ ngàŋ ŋáʼtè tɛʼ, é kwoŋo mmó gie á poŋo wɔ́b, pɔ́ le Ssé kwoŋ,
en: traitors,   reckless,  # 3:4 Ac 19:36 conceited,  # 3:4 1Tm 3:6; 6:4 lovers of pleasure  # 3:4 Php 3:19 rather than lovers of God,

ngiemboon: é gwɔ́ pʉ̀a Ssé pɔ́ nzème pǐ, é moŋe metʉ̀ Ssé mie é kɔʼɔ́ lɔgɔ wɔ́b gÿo pʉ̀a Ssé. Timotê lÿɔ́ʼte ntí pʉ̀a apɛ̌!
en: holding to the form of godliness but denying its power.   Avoid these people.  # 3:5 Mt 7:15; 2Th 3:6

ngiemboon: Etsɔ́ pʉ̀a púʼu, gwá shú ńkú mendá pʉ̀a, ńdÿɔgte panzwě pie é zeŋe zeŋe, é pie é gÿo menò tepòŋ tɛʼ, ńnéŋe ńtsɔ́ɔn shúm ntí ntí.
en: For among them are those who worm their way into households and deceive gullible women overwhelmed by sins and led astray by a variety of passions,

ngiemboon: Wɛ̌ nyìŋ wɔ́ɔ tǒ, ńzíʼi yɛ̌ ntí panzwě nò, pɔ́ zẅíʼte zẅiʼté táʼ, ńké te kuʼu lézsé nò gie áa nénʉ́ wɔ́.
en: always learning and never able to come to a knowledge of the truth.

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a pie é zíʼi wɔ́b zɔɔn ne ńdʉʼʉ nò gie áa nénʉ́. Ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ á laa tsɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ, Yanɛ́sè pɔ́ Yambelɛ́sè lʉʼʉ nò gie Mǒonsê gɔɔn la, pɛ̌ pʉ̀a gíŋe ne ńdʉʼʉ nò gie áa nénʉ́, ée pʉ̀a pie legye sɔ́b té tyé, pɔ́ piŋ ńké te záb ntʉ́m na Ssé tà shwóŋo nò wɔ́.
en: Just as Jannes and Jambres   resisted Moses,  # 3:8 Ps 77:20; Mt 8:4; Heb 3:2 so these also resist the truth. They are men who are corrupt in mind  # 3:8 1Co 14:14; Php 4:7 and worthless  # 3:8 2Co 13:5–7 in regard to the faith.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ le lɔg yɛ̌ ntí ńkẅiʼi ńgʉa tà ngʉ̀a sag wɔ́, á nue pʉ̀a metsèm ge gyá ngie pɔ́ té tsɔ́ nò zsé, anò yɔ́b gíŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ páʼ nò Yanɛ́sè pɔ́ Yambelɛ́sè.
en: But they will not make further progress, for their foolishness will be clear to all, as was the foolishness of Jannes and Jambres.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na gù, mbà pɔ̀gɔ lǎ zye ńnéŋe. Ɔ̀ ne ńzsé mmó gie n zíʼi pʉ̀a, ɔ̀ ne ńzsé yɔ́ɔn tsẅé, ńne ńzsé mmó gie n gwaa faʼ ńne ńtsɔ́ɔn yɛ̌, ńne ńzsé páʼ n záb ntʉ́m wɔ́ɔn na Ssé, ńzsé páʼ n gẅiin kwɔ̀gɔnnɛ́ púʼu, páʼ n kwoŋ pʉ̀a mesoŋ púʼu, ḿbiŋ ńzsé páʼ n kag tʉ̀ té kʉ́a púʼu.
en: But you have followed my teaching, conduct, purpose,   faith, patience, love,  # 3:10 1Co 13:1; 1Jn 4:16 and endurance,

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ ne ńzsé páʼ pʉ̀a ka kʉ́e wɔ́ɔn púʼu, ńzsé páʼ n ka gyá ngɔ́ʼ púʼu. Á lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ gie mé la gÿo lêkɔ́ na mèŋ á Antiyokia, á Ikonihum, á Lisetele wɔ́ɔ, mbà ɔ̀ ne ńzsé. N da gyá ngɔ́ʼ tɛʼ, táʼ, á gʉa na sɛ̌ lekwò wɔ́ɔ, Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ké fó tsoló, ńkẅile wɔ́ɔn kẅile,
en: along with the persecutions and sufferings   that came to me in Antioch,  # 3:11 Ac 13:14; 14:19,21 Iconium,  # 3:11 Ac 13:51; 16:2 and Lystra.  # 3:11 Ac 14:6,8; 27:5 What persecutions I endured #— #and yet the Lord rescued me from them all.

ngiemboon: ngwɔ́ nyìŋ zɔɔn le la nnɛ́ na Yěsô Keleto tà ńne ńkwoŋo légÿo mmó gie Ssé ne ńkwoŋo, mé nyé té kʉ́e yé kʉ́e wɔ́.
en: In fact, all who want to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will be persecuted.

ngiemboon: Táʼ, n gɔɔn páʼɔɔn pʉ̀a tepòŋ pâ ngàŋa fʉte ge gÿo lɔgɔ nò tepòŋ, é kẅiʼi gʉa pɔ́ lé mvfò, é ne fʉte pʉ̀a, pɔ́ gíŋe ne fʉte wɔ́b yɔ́b.
en: Evil people and impostors will become worse, deceiving   and being deceived.

ngiemboon: Á gʉa na gù, mbà á ne ńzɛ́te ngie ɔ̀ kúʼte pɔ́ mmó gie ɔ̀ la zíʼi tà ńzáb ntʉ́m mǒ. Ɔ̀ te ne ḿmoŋe nyìŋ gẅie à ka zíʼi gú wɔ́.
en: But as for you, continue in what you have learned and firmly believed. You know those who taught you,

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ la gwaa lu ssé, ńne ńzsé mmó gie Ŋwàʼne Ssé áa yɛ̌, ngwɔ́ yɛ̌ zɔ̌ náa gú legye lélɔg ńzáb ntʉ́m na Yěsô Keleto, e Ssé gÿo ɔ̀ tsẅɛ́.
en: and you know that from infancy you have known the sacred Scriptures,   which are able to give you wisdom for salvation  # 3:15 Ac 4:12; 2Co 7:10; Heb 5:9 through faith in Christ Jesus.

ngiemboon: Mé la gwaa ŋweʼe kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ tsɛ̀ɛ Ŋwàʼne Ssé wɔ́ɔ, á fóo pɔ́ ncwò Ssé. Púʼu ammó gie mé la ŋweʼe, à kuʼu lélɔg ńzíʼi pʉ̀a nò gie áa nénʉ́, ńkuʼu lélɔg ńdʉʼʉ nò gie á té nò wɔ́, ńkuʼu lélɔg ńtÿɔ́gte pʉ̀a, ḿbiŋ ńkuʼu lélɔg ńzíʼi pʉ̀a páʼ à lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ gÿo tá ńnéŋe na ntí gie e Ssé ne ńkwoŋo.
en: All Scripture is inspired by God  ,# 3:16 2Pt 1:20–21 and is profitable for teaching, for rebuking, for correcting, for training in righteousness,

ngiemboon: Púʼu ńzsé ngie nyìŋ Ssé ge fóo na Ŋwàʼne Ssé, é zsé nò Ssé mboŋó, tá gwɔ́ fʉ̀ʼʉ kɔ́ wɔ́ɔ, é kuʼu légÿo nò gie áa mbòŋ.
en: so that the man of God may be complete, equipped for every good work.
